Document.name: IndexOfInternal
Document.summary: Get the position of an element in this list by performing binary search.
Document.typeparam: Type of the element to find.
Document.returns: Returns the position. Returns -1 if it does not exist.
Document.param: If the element exist, this argument returns one of the element that equals to the specified value. If the element doesn not exist, this argument returns either the greatest element that less than the specified value, or the lest element that greater than the specified value.
Document.signature: template < typename Key > vint IndexOfInternal( Key const & item, vint & index ) const;
